channel.title: Colin McIntyre on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Colin McIntyre on The Huddle

item.title: A Constant Stream Of Specific Information
item.description: When I played in college especially, my team made a concerted effort to maintain an active sideline and to communicate efficiently from the sideline rather than simply being loud. That carried over in Club, where I played with many of those same players. When I am on the sideline helping teammates on the field, I like to select one player to communicate with and focus on two things: 1) conveying information and 2) being specific.
